entities.name: harry

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A person who is lying on the ground next to Harry and has been killed by a curse.

entities.name: avada kedavra

relationships.description: Harry is a victim of the Avada Kedavra curse, which killed Cedric.
Cedric was killed by the Avada Kedavra curse.
